metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12066 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
CServer::SendMsg in engine/server/server.cpp in Teeworlds 0.7.x before 0.7.5 allows remote attackers to shut down the server.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-12066` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

teeworlds - 0.7.5-1
teeworlds-data - 0.7.5-1
teeworlds-server - 0.7.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: teeworlds package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.5-1').
